data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 413,200 people living in Chubut, Argentina. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chubut, Argentina
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Chubut, Argentina to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 367,529 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, help the 45,671 believers in Chubut to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Chubut, Argentina.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Turk people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Chubut, Argentina not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 45,671 believers find a person of peace today among the 367,529 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 45,671 believers in Chubut to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.
